article.title: Wisconsin U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Wisconsin U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Our office is co-located with the Rader School of Business at the Milwaukee School of Engineering.

For export assistance, please contact our team of International Trade Specialists at:

Phone: 414-297-3473
Fax: 414-297-3470
Email us at:Office.Milwaukee@trade.gov

Our office is located at:

Rosenberg Hall

1235 North Milwaukee Street, R01
Milwaukee, WI 53202

Mailing address:

1025 North Broadway, R01
Milwaukee, WI 53202

Office Staff:​

Damian Felton – Director
Office: (414) 297-3457
Damian.Felton@trade.gov

Koreen Grube - International Trade Specialist​
Office: (414) 297-1853
Cell: (414) 217-8333
Koreen.Grube@trade.gov

To find out which Trade Specialist covers your area, please view our territory maphere.​​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Wisconsin U.S. Export Assistance Center.
